GSD.description: jQuery before 3.4.0, as used in Drupal, Backdrop CMS, and other products, mishandles jQuery.extend(true, {}, ...) because of Object.prototype pollution. If an unsanitized source object contained an enumerable __proto__ property, it could extend the native Object.prototype.

osvSchema.details:
jQuery before 3.4.0 mishandles jQuery.extend(true, {}, ...) because of
bject.prototype pollution. If an unsanitized source object contained an
enumerable __proto__ property, it could extend the native Object.prototype.

github.com/rubysec/ruby-advisory-db.description:
jQuery before 3.4.0 mishandles jQuery.extend(true, {}, ...) because of
bject.prototype pollution. If an unsanitized source object contained an
enumerable __proto__ property, it could extend the native Object.prototype.
github.com/rubysec/ruby-advisory-db.title: Prototype pollution attack through jQuery $.extend

advisories.description: jQuery, as used in Drupal, Backdrop CMS, and other products, mishandles `jQuery.extend(true, {}, ...)` because of `Object.prototype` pollution. If an unsanitized source object contained an enumerable `__proto__` property, it could extend the native Object.prototype.
advisories.title: Improper Neutralization of Input During Web Page Generation ('Cross-site Scripting')

advisories.description: The jQuery library, which is included in rdoc, mishandles `jQuery.extend(true, {}, ...)` because of Object.prototype pollution. If an unsanitized source object contained an enumerable `__proto__` property, it could extend the native `Object.prototype.`
advisories.title: Cross-site Scripting

advisories.title: Improper Neutralization of Input During Web Page Generation ('Cross-site Scripting')

advisories.title: Improperly Controlled Modification of Object Prototype Attributes ('Prototype Pollution')

advisories.description: jQuery mishandles `jQuery.extend(true, {}, ...)` because of `Object.prototype` pollution. If an unsanitized source object contained an enumerable ``__proto__`` property, it could extend the native `Object.prototype`.
advisories.solution: Upgrade to fixed version or apply patch.
advisories.title: Prototype pollution in jQuery

descriptions.value: jQuery before 3.4.0, as used in Drupal, Backdrop CMS, and other products, mishandles jQuery.extend(true, {}, ...) because of Object.prototype pollution. If an unsanitized source object contained an enumerable __proto__ property, it could extend the native Object.prototype.

jQuery, en versiones anteriores a 3.4.0, como es usado en Drupal, Backdrop CMS, y otros productos, maneja mal jQuery.extend(true, {}, ...) debido a la contaminación de Object.prototype. Si un objeto fuente no sanitizado contenía una propiedad enumerable __proto__, podría extender el Object.prototype nativo.
